attributes.action: Stop schools from having windows and doors open due to COVID
attributes.additional_details:
Young children are becoming unwell due to the cold weather,
Other illnesses will occur due to the cold weather, meaning more children attending hospitals.
Children should not have to suffer like this!
attributes.background: To stop schools having windows and doors open in schools due to COVID

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual schools.

Government guidance for schools identifies the need to balance ventilation and maintaining a comfortable temperature. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/actions-for-schools-during-the-coronavirus-outbreak/covid-19-schools-operational-guidance
